item.title: Report X-2024040548
item.description:
Report X-2024040548

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-18T18:14:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-04
  • City: TACOMA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: As the package was being unloaded the package handler noticed a white residue coming out of the bottom. DescribePack: A large crack on the side of the drum DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Once the package was discovered the box was set inside a hazmat tote, taken to the damage hazmat cage, and set under the vent

item.title: Report X-2024040492
item.description:
Report X-2024040492

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-18T18:14:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-02
  • City: AUBURN
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was noticed to be leaking on the bottom of the box, box was then brought to QA for further inspection. DescribePack: Bottles had partially unscrewed caps allowing some of its contents to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately placed inside a lined tote to mitigate the effects of the release.
